short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developer notifications and dashboard for CI servers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Overview of all your CI builds in one place
- Supports multiple continuous integration servers
- Configurable notifications
- Fullscreen mode let's you setup information radiator for your team within minutes
- Works on Windows, Mac and Linux

Permissions required:
- all http(s) urls so you can monitor any service
- notifications
- alarms (update state every 30 seconds)
- storage (configuration and state stored in local storage)
